events.title: OpenAI Releases GPT-4.5
events.description: OpenAI released GPT-4.5, its largest and best model for chat, as a research preview. The model advances unsupervised learning with reduced hallucinations, improved EQ, and better human collaboration. Available to Pro users at $75/million input tokens.

events.title: Anthropic Launches Claude 3.7 Sonnet and Claude Code
events.description: Anthropic announced Claude 3.7 Sonnet, the first hybrid reasoning model on the market, featuring extended thinking mode. Also introduced Claude Code, an agentic coding tool for terminal-based development.

events.title: Google Makes Gemini 2.0 Generally Available
events.description: Google released Gemini 2.0 Flash for general availability, introduced Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental with best coding performance, and launched Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite as most cost-efficient model.

events.title: xAI Releases Grok 3
events.description: Elon Musk's xAI launched Grok 3, trained with 10x computational resources of prior models, featuring enhanced reasoning, coding, and deep research capabilities. Available to Premium+ and SuperGrok subscribers.

events.title: OpenAI Operator Launches to Pro Users
events.description: OpenAI's Operator AI agent, which can perform tasks autonomously using its own browser, became available to ChatGPT Pro subscribers in the US as a research preview.

events.title: OpenAI Expands Operator Internationally
events.description: OpenAI rolled out Operator to ChatGPT Pro subscribers in Australia, Brazil, Canada, India, Japan, Singapore, South Korea, UK, and more countries.

events.title: Hugging Face Releases Open Deep Research
events.description: Hugging Face released Open Deep Research, an open-source agentic AI system for conducting autonomous research tasks.

events.title: Google Launches AI Co-Scientist
events.description: Google announced a new AI system for scientists that can help create novel hypotheses and research plans, marking a significant step in AI-assisted scientific discovery.

events.title: DeepSeek R1 Analysis and Global Impact
events.description: Analysis of DeepSeek R1's January release continued, with CSIS publishing detailed assessment of how the Chinese model is redefining the AI race and challenging US export control assumptions.

events.title: DeepSeek Shakes Up AI Sector
events.description: World Economic Forum published analysis on how DeepSeek's open-source AI is disrupting the industry, having surpassed ChatGPT as top-rated free app on US Apple App Store.

events.title: DeepSeek Opens Beijing Office
events.description: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek expanded operations with new office in Beijing as it continued to gain global attention following R1 release.

events.title: EU AI Act Prohibitions Take Effect
events.description: First requirements of EU AI Act came into force, including prohibitions on certain AI systems and requirements on AI literacy (Chapter 1 and Chapter 2).

events.title: EU Moves Toward AI in Science Strategy
events.description: European Union advanced strategy for using AI in scientific research, part of broader Digital Inclusion Action Plan.

events.title: UK Digital Inclusion Action Plan Published
events.description: UK published Digital Inclusion Action Plan with call for evidence on AI's role in digital inclusion.

events.title: SoftBank CEO Son Pitches AI for Business in Tokyo
events.description: SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son attended event with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in Tokyo, pitching AI for businesses as part of ongoing $40 billion OpenAI investment discussions.

events.title: SoftBank Finalizes $40B OpenAI Investment Terms
events.description: CNBC reported SoftBank was finalizing $40 billion investment in OpenAI at $260 billion pre-money valuation, to be paid over 12-24 months.

events.title: Stargate Project Gains Momentum
events.description: The $500 billion Stargate AI infrastructure project announced by Trump in January continued development, with OpenAI, SoftBank, and Oracle advancing plans.

events.title: AI Data Center Investment Surge
events.description: Reports showed AI infrastructure development spreading to more states, with data center markets changing as AI models deployed closer to users.

events.title: Nvidia Reports Record Q4 FY2025 Earnings
events.description: Nvidia reported Q4 revenue of $39.3 billion, up 78% year-over-year, driven by AI chip demand. Automotive sales reached $570 million, up 103% YoY.

events.title: Nvidia GPU Demand Outpaces Supply
events.description: Reports indicated Nvidia's AI GPU demand continued to outpace supply, with hyperscalers planning record capex for 2026.

events.title: Google Search AI Assistant Vision
events.description: Google CEO Sundar Pichai announced Google wants Search to be more like an AI assistant, describing AI as the most profound shift in our lifetimes.

events.title: Google Gemini Code Assist Free Launch
events.description: Google launched Gemini Code Assist for free, providing AI coding assistance to developers without cost.

events.title: GitHub Copilot Agent Rise Analysis
events.description: Forbes published analysis on GitHub Copilot Agent and the rise of AI coding assistants, noting competition from Cursor and Windsurf.

events.title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet Available on Yale Clarity Platform
events.description: Yale University announced Claude 3.5 Sonnet availability on its Clarity Platform for academic use.

events.title: Andrej Karpathy Coins 'Vibe Coding'
events.description: AI researcher Andrej Karpathy coined the term 'vibe coding' to describe programming where developers describe what they want in natural language and accept AI-generated code.

events.title: Perplexity Releases R1-1776
events.description: Perplexity released R1-1776, a post-trained model enhancing their AI search capabilities.

events.title: Thomson Reuters vs ROSS AI Copyright Ruling
events.description: Judge Stephanos Bibas ruled on Thomson Reuters v. ROSS Intelligence case regarding AI training on copyrighted legal content, setting important precedent.

events.title: AI Copyright Lawsuits Spike
events.description: Reports showed over 70 AI copyright infringement lawsuits pending, with courts beginning to address substantive merits of claims.

events.title: Disney AI Training Controversy
events.description: Disney faced unclean hands defense in copyright case due to its own purported use of AI training on copyrighted works.

events.title: Workday Announces AI-Related Layoffs
events.description: HR platform Workday announced cutting 8.5% of workforce (1,750 jobs) to prioritize AI investment, one of first major AI-attributed layoffs of 2025.

events.title: AI Workforce Impact Analysis
events.description: Reports analyzed AI's growing impact on workforce, with companies citing AI as reason for restructuring and layoffs.

events.title: Tech Layoffs Continue Amid AI Investment
events.description: Multiple tech companies continued layoffs while redirecting resources to AI development and infrastructure.

events.title: Google Lens iOS AI Overviews
events.description: Google launched ability to use Lens to search screen while browsing on iOS, with AI Overviews integration.

events.title: Google Career Exploration AI Experiment
events.description: Google launched new AI experiment to help people explore more career possibilities.

events.title: OpenAI Sora Integration Plans
events.description: OpenAI announced plans to integrate Sora video generation into ChatGPT, letting users generate videos from the chatbot.

events.title: AI Robotics Humanoid Developments
events.description: Multiple reports highlighted humanoid robots dominating robotics conversation, with AI integration advancing rapidly.

events.title: AI in Surgical Robotics Advances
events.description: Advances in AI-powered surgical robotics reported, with improved precision and autonomous capabilities.

events.title: Oxford Economics Robotics Revolution Report
events.description: Oxford Economics published report confirming the robotics revolution predicted in 2019 has arrived, driven by AI advances.

events.title: AI Healthcare Watch List 2025
events.description: NCBI published 2025 Watch List focusing on AI innovations in healthcare, signaling technology's impact on future health system needs.

events.title: Five AI Healthcare Innovations for 2025
events.description: Forbes published analysis of five AI innovations set to redefine healthcare in 2025.

events.title: AI Primary Care Provider Shortage Solutions
events.description: Reports explored AI solutions for primary care provider shortage, with Mass General Brigham testing AI approaches.

events.title: Google Responsible AI Progress Report
events.description: Google published February 2025 Responsible AI Progress Report detailing methods for governing, mapping, measuring, and managing AI risks.

events.title: AI Safety Research Program Applications
events.description: SPAR AI safety research program announced mentee application results, advancing AI safety research initiatives.

events.title: Anthropic Safety Techniques in Claude 3.7
events.description: Anthropic detailed new safety techniques used in Claude 3.7 Sonnet, including visible extended thinking for transparency.

events.title: Cybercriminals Using Jailbroken AI Tools
events.description: Reports revealed cybercriminals using jailbroken AI tools including Grok on dark web forums like BreachForums.

events.title: AI Security Concerns Rise
events.description: Growing concerns about AI security vulnerabilities and misuse, with calls for better safeguards.

events.title: New York Times AI Newsroom Tools
events.description: New York Times introduced AI tools including Echo for newsroom operations, copyediting, content summarization, and SEO optimization.

events.title: AI in Journalism Debate Intensifies
events.description: Debate over AI use in journalism intensified as more news organizations adopted AI tools while ensuring human oversight.

events.title: IBM HashiCorp Acquisition for AI Infrastructure
events.description: IBM's $6.4 billion acquisition of HashiCorp progressed, aimed at improving infrastructure for hybrid cloud and AI scenarios.

events.title: AI Infrastructure Stocks Outperform
events.description: AI infrastructure stocks including Lumentum, Celestica, and Seagate outperformed Nvidia in 2025, showing broader AI investment opportunities.

thematic_clusters.name: Frontier Model Releases
thematic_clusters.description: Major AI model releases from leading labs including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and xAI

thematic_clusters.name: Rise of AI Agents
thematic_clusters.description: Launch and expansion of autonomous AI agents for tasks, research, and coding

thematic_clusters.name: DeepSeek and AI Geopolitics
thematic_clusters.description: Impact of Chinese AI on global competition and US-China tech dynamics

thematic_clusters.name: AI Infrastructure Boom
thematic_clusters.description: Massive investments in AI infrastructure, data centers, and chips

thematic_clusters.name: AI Coding Revolution
thematic_clusters.description: Advances in AI coding assistants and the emergence of vibe coding

thematic_clusters.name: AI Copyright Battles
thematic_clusters.description: Legal battles over AI training data and copyright

thematic_clusters.name: AI Workforce Impact
thematic_clusters.description: AI's impact on jobs, layoffs, and workforce transformation

thematic_clusters.name: AI Safety and Security
thematic_clusters.description: AI safety research, responsible AI, and security concerns
